verses.verse: And <S%G4569>Saul<s%> was <S%G4909>consenting<s%> to his <S%G336>death.<s%> And <S%G1722>at<s%> that <S%G2250>time<s%> there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem;<s%> and they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1289>scattered<s%> <S%G1289>abroad<s%> <S%G2596>throughout<s%> the <S%G5561>regions<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> and <S%G4540>Samaria,<s%> <S%G4133>except<s%> the <S%G652>apostles.<s%>
And <S%G2126>devout<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G4792>carried<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%> to his burial, and <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2870>lamentation<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> him.

As for <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> he made <S%G3075>havoc<s%> of the <S%G1577>church,<s%> <S%G1531>entering<s%> <S%G1531>into<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> and <S%G4951>haling<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> them to <S%G5438>prison.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they that were <S%G1289>scattered<s%> <S%G1289>abroad<s%> <S%G1330>went<s%> <S%G1330>every<s%> <S%G1330>where<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2718>went<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> to the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G4540>Samaria,<s%> and <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to them.

And the <S%G3793>people<s%> with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G4337>gave<s%> <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> things which <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G3004>spoke,<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> and <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G4592>miracles<s%> which he <S%G4160>did.<s%>

For <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G994>crying<s%> with <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G2192>possessed<s%> with them: and <S%G4183>many<s%> taken with <S%G3886>palsies,<s%> and that were <S%G5560>lame,<s%> were <S%G2323>healed.<s%>
And there was <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> in that <S%G4172>city.<s%>

But there was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G3686>called<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> which <S%G4391>beforetime<s%> in the same <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3096>used<s%> <S%G3096>sorcery,<s%> and <S%G1839>bewitched<s%> the <S%G1484>people<s%> of <S%G4540>Samaria,<s%> <S%G3004>giving<s%> out that <S%G1438>himself<s%> was <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> one:

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4337>gave<s%> <S%G4337>heed,<s%> from the <S%G3398>least<s%> to the <S%G3173>greatest,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man is the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And to him they had <S%G4337>regard,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> that of <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> he had <S%G1839>bewitched<s%> them with <S%G3095>sorceries.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> they were <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G1135>women.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> and when he was <S%G907>baptized,<s%> he <S%G4342>continued<s%> with <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> and <S%G1839>wondered,<s%> <S%G2334>beholding<s%> the <S%G1411>miracles<s%> and <S%G4592>signs<s%> which were <S%G1096>done.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G4540>Samaria<s%> had <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> they <S%G649>sent<s%> to them <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John:<s%>
<S%G3748>Who,<s%> when they were <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%> for them, that they might <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost:<s%>

(For as <S%G3768>yet<s%> he was <S%G1968>fallen<s%> on <S%G3762>none<s%> of them: <S%G3440>only<s%> they were <S%G907>baptized<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>)
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> they their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them, and they <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

And when <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2300>saw<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1936>laying<s%> <S%G1936>on<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles'<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> was <S%G1325>given,<s%> he <S%G4374>offered<s%> them <S%G5536>money,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G1325>Give<s%> me <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> that <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G3739>whomsoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> I <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> he may <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Your <S%G694>money<s%> <S%G1510>perish<s%> with you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G3543>thought<s%> that the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G2932>purchased<s%> with <S%G5536>money.<s%>

You <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G3310>part<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2819>lot<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>matter:<s%> for your <S%G2588>heart<s%> is not <S%G2117>right<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3340>Repent<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> your <S%G2549>wickedness,<s%> and <S%G1189>pray<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>perhaps<s%> the <S%G1963>thought<s%> of <S%G4671>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> may be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you.
For I <S%G3708>perceive<s%> that you are in the <S%G5521>gall<s%> of <S%G4088>bitterness,<s%> and in the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1189>Pray<s%> you to the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> for me, that <S%G3367>none<s%> of these things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G2046>spoken<s%> <S%G1904>come<s%> on me.

And they, when they had <S%G1263>testified<s%> and <S%G2980>preached<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> in <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2968>villages<s%> of the <S%G4541>Samaritans.<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G450>Arise,<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2596>toward<s%> the <S%G3314>south<s%> to the <S%G3598>way<s%> that <S%G3597>goes<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G1048>Gaza,<s%> <S%G3778>which<s%> is <S%G2048>desert.<s%>

And he <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G4198>went:<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G128>Ethiopia,<s%> an <S%G2135>eunuch<s%> of great <S%G1413>authority<s%> under <S%G2582>Candace<s%> <S%G938>queen<s%> of the <S%G128>Ethiopians,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> had the <S%G1909>charge<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> her <S%G1047>treasure,<s%> and had <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> for to <S%G4352>worship,<s%>
Was <S%G5290>returning,<s%> and <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in his <S%G716>chariot<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G4334>Go<s%> <S%G4334>near,<s%> and <S%G2853>join<s%> yourself to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G716>chariot.<s%>

And <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G4370>ran<s%> <S%G4370>thither<s%> to him, and <S%G191>heard<s%> him <S%G314>read<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1097>Understand<s%> you <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G314>read?<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> I, <S%G3362>except<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> man should <S%G3594>guide<s%> me? And he <S%G3870>desired<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> that he would <S%G305>come<s%> up and <S%G2523>sit<s%> with him.

The <S%G4042>place<s%> of the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> which he <S%G314>read<s%> was <S%G3778>this,<s%> He was <S%G71>led<s%> as a <S%G4263>sheep<s%> to the <S%G4967>slaughter;<s%> and <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G286>lamb<s%> <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G1726>before<s%> his <S%G2751>shearer,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> he not his <S%G4750>mouth:<s%>

In his <S%G5014>humiliation<s%> his <S%G2920>judgment<s%> was <S%G142>taken<s%> away: and <S%G5101>who<s%> shall <S%G1334>declare<s%> his <S%G1074>generation?<s%> for his <S%G2222>life<s%> is <S%G142>taken<s%> from the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And the <S%G2135>eunuch<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1189>pray<s%> you, of <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3004>speaks<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G5124>this?<s%> of <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> man?

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G5026>same<s%> <S%G1124>scripture,<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> to him <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And as they <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> their <S%G3598>way,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5204>water:<s%> and the <S%G2135>eunuch<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2400>See,<s%> here is <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> does <S%G2967>hinder<s%> me to be <S%G907>baptized?<s%>

And <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> you <S%G1832>may.<s%> And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G4100>believe<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G716>chariot<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G2476>still:<s%> and they <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> and the <S%G2135>eunuch;<s%> and he <S%G907>baptized<s%> him.

And <S%G3753>when<s%> they were <S%G305>come<s%> up out of the <S%G5204>water,<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G726>caught<s%> <S%G726>away<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> that the <S%G2135>eunuch<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more:<s%> and he <S%G4198>went<s%> on his <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G5463>rejoicing.<s%>

But <S%G5376>Philip<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G108>Azotus:<s%> and <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> he <S%G2097>preached<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea.<s%>
